storyInfo: Unable to find the package's owner, Angelina returns to Rhodes Island only to find that the owner of the package in her hand is Suzuran.

attributes.content: This was my last delivery stop today.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Oh, a fast food shop! My favorite!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Deep fried meat! Fries! Salt 'n pepper shrooms! Yeah, I want 'em all!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Huh? The girl isn't here.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Wait, how many orders of fried meat, you said? Two? Twenty? Are you sure you can eat all that?
attributes.name: Fast Food Joint Owner

attributes.content: Alright, who am I to complain? Ten with ketchup, ten with salt. Here you go—What about you, girl? What can I get you for?
attributes.name: Fast Food Joint Owner

attributes.content: Hm... mmm... Smells so good.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: No, I can't have stop for a midnight snack yet. I still have work to do.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Sorry, sir, but what happened to the girl who was reading in your restaurant this evening?
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Oh, her? She left. Probably trying to make her way back to the next town over.
attributes.name: Fast Food Joint Owner

attributes.content: She's going overnight?
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Yeah, overnight. If she didn't leave right away, she probably wouldn't make it to see her old man for the last time.
attributes.name: Fast Food Joint Owner

attributes.content: Eh, I think I remember now. You stopped by once in the evening, didn't you? Are you the Messenger who delivered the news to Emily?
attributes.name: Fast Food Joint Owner

attributes.content: I... Yeah, I did... I didn't know that's what it was about, though.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Eh, Emily is studying here by herself. Whenever she has some free time, she helps me out with the shop to make some extra money.
attributes.name: Fast Food Joint Owner

attributes.content: Her old man back home never failed to send her a monthly letter, but there's been nothing from him these past two months.
attributes.name: Fast Food Joint Owner

attributes.content: She was really worried about it, you know. She even came to you Messengers and asked if any of you missed his letters.
attributes.name: Fast Food Joint Owner

attributes.content: Baws, we know how to do our jobs. We don't just lose our mail.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Right, right, right. I believe you. Emily trusts you, too, but, with no news from her family, she was really anxious.
attributes.name: Fast Food Joint Owner

attributes.content: No wonder she seemed so happy when she saw me this evening.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: But then...
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Eh, what's that saying again? Life is unpredictable and you never know what's coming next. All of us are bound to die one day.
attributes.name: Fast Food Joint Owner

attributes.content: Besides, if it wasn't for you delivering her old man's last letter to her, she wouldn't have known to rush home right away.
attributes.name: Fast Food Joint Owner

attributes.content: I'm sure she's really grateful.
attributes.name: Fast Food Joint Owner

attributes.content: Right, did you need her for something?
attributes.name: Fast Food Joint Owner

attributes.content: Well... Never mind.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I guess this isn't hers.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Alright, if there's nothing else, you should get something to eat. I'll give you girls a discount!
attributes.name: Fast Food Joint Owner

attributes.content: *Burp*—
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Man, did I really eat all that? Darn it, spent all my money for the month again!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: The sun is coming up soon.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: We sure ran all over town in just one night! Really had me starving. Huh, you ain't ate nothing!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Still thinking about Emily?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Well, maybe that's only part of it.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Since I heard her story, I just can't help but keep thinking that maybe there's someone out there waiting for news about me.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Oh, right, you haven't been back home in a long time, right?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: If just passing through counts, then it hasn't really been that long.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Eh, you ever thought about when to go back? Y'should contact your folks once, at least.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I don't know...
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I'm not sure I'm ready yet.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Ready fer what? Yer sickness is nice and stable fer now, ain't it? Ya were sayin' you'd rather yer folks think yer gone than watch ya writhe in pain, but what about now?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: If they think I've gone missing, then they'd probably still hold out hope that I'm doing okay somewhere in the world even after five or ten years.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: But they're worried sick!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Besides, we've got all them doctors in Medical! What's five or ten years? You've got a long, bright future ahead of you!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Huh? Who's that?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I think I saw a... No, one, two, three... That's lots of fluffy tails.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Oh, it's Angelina and Croissant. G-Good morning.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Oh, hey there, Lisa. Good morning. Why are you up so early? Your wakeup time isn't for a while yet.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Um... Um... I wanted to take a look at that...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: 'That?' What do you mean, 'That?'
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Well, it's the notes...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I finished it yesterday, and I wanted to show it to you right away, but it was getting late. I-I didn't want Dr. Kal'tsit to yell at me for not going to bed on time...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But I really, really wanted to let you see it right away!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Is that why you left it in front of the dorm?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Yep... Yep!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I thought Angelina would be really happy to see it after she came home from work.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: My my, lookie here, Angelina. That package is yours, just like I said.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Let's open it up and take a look!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: It's... for me?
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: It's wrapped so neatly... and it's my favorite color, pink. This scent... I thought it seemed familiar. It's that fragrance from the Medical Department the other day!
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I-Is there a smell? I made it after I was done with homework.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Maybe the smell got on there while I was there?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Oh, it's not bad at all. I really like this aroma too. It makes me feel relaxed. Alright, I'm opening it up! 1, 2, 3!
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: There's a booklet inside...
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I remember this river... and these buildings... Oh, that's my favorite cafe!
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: If you walk east for about ten minutes, you'll reach a street that I've probably walked hundreds, no, thousands of times.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Also... this petal... I think I know this smell...
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: My dad sent me the petals!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Most of the stuff in the beginning is photos that my mom's friend sent, but I also drew lots of things from memory too. It still looks kinda ugly, though... Even though I've been practicing...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: No, they look so pretty!
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: All of it looks so, so nice.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Um, Angelina... D-Did I do something wrong? You don't seem happy... Are you sad?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: No, I'm not sad.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I'm just... overwhelmed.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Ever since I... I haven't seen any of this while it's still bright out.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I thought I'd left all this somewhere far, far away long ago... It's so distant, I thought I'd never get there again no matter how fast I ran.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Yep, Rhodes Island is a big, biiiig ship, and it's always going somewhere.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: When I first got here, I'd always ask Folinic where we were at the time, and I would try to figure out how far we were from Siracusa and Higashi.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Sometimes we were close, and sometimes we were far away. Then I lost track.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: But every time I get a letter from my mom or dad, or their friends, I hug the letter before bed. It makes me feel like I'm right there snuggling up to my parents.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: After a while, I got so many letters that they would overflow the bed if I took them all... Mm, so I put some of them in a booklet.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: That way, I can go to bed hugging the booklet!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Yep... You're so cute, Lisa.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Huh? Is that weird?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Nope, what you said actually makes a lot of sense.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Doctor told me that not only are our Messengers always on the road making deliveries, they need to take care of their Rhodes Island work too. It's a lot of hard work, and I thought it might have been a while since you've been home.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The Doctor even complimented me on my notebook! Said I was amazing!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Doctor says you might need to try something this...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: The Doctor said that...?
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Yep, and everyone else too, not just the people working at Rhodes Island! There was the Siracusan Messenger who gave me stuff before.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I don't remember when everybody started doing it, but whenever they go to Siracusa or Higashi, they would bring back photos or the local specialties there for me.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Hoowee, sounds like everybody's a Messenger now!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Right, they're just like all of our amazing Messengers! So I put all those things in my booklet. It's one of my most precious treasures!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I think to myself every day that, by the time the book is full, I'll be all grown up! I'll be so much more amazing than I am now.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: It'll be my turn to protect everyone and my mom and dad.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Dad won't stay up all night worrying about me, and Mom won't need to keep working herself to death for me anymore.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: When that day comes, I'll finally get to go home!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: So, after Doctor talked to me about it, I thought I'd make one for you too...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: You can't go home for some reason, right?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: It's a promise! I'll give you another one once I get new photos, Angelina!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: That way, your book will fill up even faster, and you'll get to go home sooner!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Thanks. Thanks so much... This is a wonderful present.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Oh, it's my wake-up time now! I can't let Dr. Kal'tsit and Folinic find out I've been running around... I need to get back home! See you, Angelina, Croissant!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Darn, I wish I'd put money on that.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: What'd I tell ya. Yer such a cutie, yer bound to get a buncha cute presents!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Uh... yeah.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I never even noticed. I guess I've long become a part of Rhodes Island, and there are people here who care about me.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I'm no longer... the girl went gone missing.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: *Yawn*—I'm getting tired. Did you say somethin' just now, Angelina? I didn't hear.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: N-Nothing.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I was just saying that I really like Lisa's present.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Just like I said, ain't it? This night's full o' surprises!
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: Wonder if I should go back fer a nap now. Maybe some chow instead...? Yeah, guess I'll grab a bite to eat.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: What about you? You didn't sleep the whole night. This is gonna ruin that beauty plan of yours.
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I'll take a break and then head to training after a while.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I got classes in the afternoon too...
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I may have work to keep up with, but I can't fall behind with my studies either!
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Huh? No kiddin'? You turnin' workaholic or something?
attributes.name: Croissant

attributes.content: I'm not.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Will I get to go home... when the book is all filled up?
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: Am I ready for that?
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: How long has this letter been on my desk...? A few months? Half a year?
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: 'Dear Mom and Dad—'
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: 'Everything is going well over here...'
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: 'I have a really good job, and I'm keeping up with my studies...'
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: 'Yes, I got Oripathy, but you don't need that worry. It happened that day on my way to school...'
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: 'I was in a rush to make it to club... I told Dad I didn't need a ride. If I were just a little more careful, maybe I wouldn't have bumped into that car fresh back from the wilds.'
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: 'None of this is Dad's fault.'
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I'll keep the letter in this page.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: I'll be ready one day, and I know Mom and Dad will be ready too.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: When I'm finally done with this letter, I'll take it to the place in the photo myself. Yeah, the third house on this street from the east. I'll draw a heart here.
attributes.name: Angelina

attributes.content: That day is going to be here soon. I know it.
attributes.name: Angelina
